comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
An anarchist rally in Union Square, New York City, dated by Bain as March 21, 1914.

Several Bain/LOC photos of a massive Union Square anarchist-IWW-socialist rally on April 11, 1914, already have been posted on Flickr. This one shows the celebrated anarchist, Alexander Berkman, speaking:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5126126120/]
